channel.title: Posts on Brian Barkley's website

item.title: Hello, Blogdown
item.description: Back to it Hi all, I’m excited to get back to social media! I took a short break in 2018 to earn my PhD, move across the country, and start my career in data science. I’m happy to report that Kohl’s is treating me well, and I am excited for what we have planned.
